column1: | Note: It is not permissible for trains to have pathing, engineering or performance allowances between Ely Dock |                                                      |               |
| Junction and Ely station in either direction as there are no signals in this section.                          |                                                      |               |
| Between all conflicting movements unless stated otherwise below:                                               | 3                                                    |               |
| Pass on Up Main towards Waterbeach                                                                             | Pass from Soham                                      | 2             |
| Pass on Up Main towards Waterbeach                                                                             | Pass from Waterbeach crossing from Down              | 2             |
| Passenger pass from Soham to Ely Platform 1                                                                    | Pass towards Soham or Waterbeach having              | 2             |
| Freight pass from Soham to Ely Platform 1                                                                      | Pass towards Soham or Waterbeach having              | 21⁄2          |
| Platform 1 at Ely can only be accessed from Ely North Junction via the Down Line. Up trains using Platform 1   |                                                      |               |
| conflict at Ely with Down train departures/passes from platforms 2 or 3 unless these are routed via UL.        |                                                      |               |
| Up departure from platform 1 or 3 towards                                                                      | 40mph crossover speed at Ely Dock Junction /         | {1⁄2}         |
| Waterbeach                                                                                                     | Line speed through platform 3                        | approaching   |
| Up train arrives Platform 2 or 3 from Ely North                                                                | Down train departs Platform 2 or 3                   | 1             |
| Down train arrives Platform 2 or 3 from Ely                                                                    | Up train departs Platform 1, 2 or 3                  | Same time (0) |
|                                                                                                                | 10 minutes for GTR services to / from King’s Cross * |               |
| * May be reduced to 9 minutes by exception and subject to agreement with GTR                                   |                                                      |               |
| Train arrives in platform 2                                                                                    | Second train arrives permissively in platform 2      | 3             |
| Train arrives in platform 3                                                                                    | Second train arrives permissively in platform 3      | 3             |
| Train departs platform 2                                                                                       | Train departs platform 2 in opposite direction or    | 2             |
